title: Invitation, "Willi Forst's Mazurka, Festpremiere im Apollo, December 18, 1935", 1935
medium: Letterpress and offset lithograph on black and white wove paper, mounted on grey-blue wove paper

tombstone.epitaph:
Invitation, "Willi Forst's Mazurka, Festpremiere im Apollo, December 18, 1935", 1935.
1935. Letterpress and offset lithograph on black and white wove paper, mounted on grey-blue wove paper. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-47.
